data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mound, Laurence A., Reynaud, Philippe (2005): Franklinothrips, a pantropical Thysanoptera genus of ant­mimicking obligate predators (Aeolothripidae). Zootaxa 864: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170856
